alert.note: Alert for Comanche; Eastland; Erath; Jack; Palo Pinto (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 9:27PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Erath, central Eastland, southern Jack, Palo Pinto and northwestern Comanche Counties through 1015 PM CDT... At 925 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bryson to 8 miles south of Possum Kingdom Lake to near Gorman to near Cross Plains. Movement was east- southeast at 40 to 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea to half inch size hail possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Stephenville, Mineral Wells, Dublin, De Leon, Gorman, Rising Star, Graford, Bryson, Gordon, Palo Pinto, Proctor Lake, Huckabay, Bluff Dale, Lake Palo Pinto, Morgan Mill, Palo Pinto Mountains State Park, Lake Leon, Possum Kingdom Lake, Strawn, and Perrin. This includes Interstate 20 between mile markers 355 and 389. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Comanche; Eastland; Erath; Jack; Palo Pinto
